alessi.Name: Plissé Kettle
alessi.Body:
The Plissé electric kettle combines functional aspects with a plastic and fascinating design that reveals the creator's architectural background, as well as his passion for the handicraft and for sculpture. Like a fabric that a thick pleating transforms into a three-dimensional shape, this kettle is reminiscent of an haute couture dress, a beautiful object to be left on display on your kitchen top.

With 1500 watts for quick boiling, a removable filter for easy cleaning, an automatic shut-off, and a cord-free base, the Plissé Electric Kettle is as functional as it is beautiful. 

Designed by Michele De Lucchi in Italy

Materials: Thermoplastic resin

alessi.Name: Grind Salt and Pepper Grinder
alessi.Body:
The original Grind salt, pepper and spices grinder is ideal for those who like to cook their own dishes, appreciating the fragrance of a freshly ground spice. An expressive design for everyday use, transformed into an elegant, indispensable complement to be placed on the table. This salt and pepper grinder makes the perfect table centerpiece.

Ingeniously designed, this grinder has the grind placed at the top of the grinder, so no traces are left on the surfaces after use. A sophisticated addition to any interior, this grinder also makes a great gift idea for fine food lovers and budding chefs.

Designed by: William Alsop & Federico Grazzini

Materials: Aluminum casting & ceramic

Care: When refilling the grinder, take a soft brush and wipe away any residue dust from the bottom, as well as the neck. Adjust the coarseness to your liking, and grind away.

alessi.Name: Juicy Salif Citrus Squeezer
alessi.Body:
The Alessi Juicy Salif Citrus Squeezer is an icon of revolutionary kitchenware. Not just a striking design, this juice squeezer is surprisingly functional. Made from a mirror polished and durable aluminium, its long, spider-like legs are tall enough to fit your glass underneath - ready to collect your lemon, orange or lime juice. The simplistic yet unforgettable form came to the designer on a pizzeria napkin during a seaside holiday in Italy.

Designed by Philippe Starck

Materials: Aluminum casting, mirror-polished

Care: Hand wash immediately after use and dry with a soft cloth. Not dishwasher safe.

alessi.Name: Plissé Toaster
alessi.Body:
The Plissé toaster elegant design together with its pleated surface exhorts you to display it on the kitchen counter. The numerous functions the toaster is equipped with make it easy and safe to use and its six browning levels suit every taste.

  • 850W
  • Optional Toaster Racks allow slices of bread to be easily inserted into and removed from the toaster.
  • 6 browning levels can be easily adjusted with the relevant button.
  • "Bagel" function allows just one side of the bread to be toasted.
  • Non-slip base, ensuring stability during use.

Designed by Michele De Lucchi in Italy

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and stainless steel

Care: Clean the outer surface with a damp cloth and dry carefully. Do not flip the toaster upside down or shake it, rather remove the crumbs from the collection tray located near the base of the toaster. Before putting the toaster away, always allow it to cool completely and be sure to wind the cable around the winder and not around the body of the appliance.

alessi.Name: Virgula Divina Bottle Opener
alessi.Body:
The Virgula Divina bottle opener recalls the enigmatic Y-shaped rod, the dowser's divination tool in his search for hidden treasures, in both name and form. A perfect drawing transformed into a practical bottle opener.

Designed by Frédéric Gooris

Material: Mirror-polished 18/10 stainless steel

Care: Dishwasher safe

alessi.Name: Kitchen Timer
alessi.Body:
Graves's personal style blends ideas taken from European tradition, Art Deco, American Pop Art and memories of pre-Colombian cultures. The American designer also has an ability to bewitch the general public like few other designers. 

Whether timing a soft-boiled egg or cooking pasta al dente, the Kitchen Timer is both precise and stylish.

Designed by Michael Graves

Materials: Thermoplastic resin

Care/Instructions: Turn dial all the way to 60 and then turn back to desired time

alessi.Name: Plissé Jug
alessi.Body:
Concise geometric lines and an attentive composition of the elements, inspired by the worlds of fashion and architecture. Its three-dimensional surface resembles pleated fabric, and it has a dynamic, sculptural silhouette.

Lightweight and easy to use, the Plissé thermo insulating jug does not hide how practical it is, integrating this with an iconic and timeless shape, it is well suited for serving coffee, tea as well as cold drinks, and its double wall thermal glass inside helps to keep drinks at the desired temperature for longer.

Designed by Michele De Lucchi

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and double-walled thermal glass

Care: Handwash

Designed by Miriam Mirri

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and 18/10 stainless steel

Care: Hand wash only

alessi.Name: Alessandro M. Corkscrew
alessi.Body:
A design self-portrait created by Alessandro Mendini, the Alessandro M. corkscrew returns dressed in a new chromatic range invented by its author. Dedicated to the collectors of Alessandro Mendini’s work and of his ‘quick-change' corkscrews, and for those wishing to uncork a fine wine with a tool combining function and emotion.

Designed by Alessandro Mendini

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and chrome-plated zamak

Care: Use a damp cloth or sponge with a non-abrasive detergent. Do not wash in the dishwasher

alessi.Name: Birillo Bathroom Waste Bin
alessi.Body:
The family of objects for the bathroom Birillo has been designed by Piero Lissoni and it is part of the family of object for the Bathroom Birillo. The balance between the minimal shape and the used materials is the main characteristic of this project. The entire range of product is minimal and essential thanks to its rectangular shape and very well finished with it's rounded edges. The objects are simple but never dull.

Designed by Piero Lissoni

Materials: White PMMA

Care: Hand wash

alessi.Name: Blip Spoon Rest
alessi.Body:

Designed by: Laura Polinoro and Paolo Gerosa

Materials: 18/10 stainless steel

Care: Dishwasher Safe

Made in Italy

all-products.Name: Abbracciaio Candle Holder
all-products.Body:
Abbracciaio is an aluminium casting of two shapes which, when placed one in front of the other, become a loving embrace. The two structures composing the candelabra link together giving the piece stability.

Designed by Philippe Starck

Materials: Galvanized or Painted Aluminium

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth with soap or liquid detergent, preferably diluted in water. To remove candle wax from the candelabra, run hot tap water over it until the wax has completely melted. Do not use abrasive sponges or other instruments that could damage the candelabra. It is preferable to use non-drip candles. Important: do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents containing even small quantities of acetone, trichloroethylene and ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth with soap or liquid detergent, preferably diluted in water. To remove candle wax from the candelabra, run hot tap water over it until the wax has completely melted. Do not use abrasive sponges or other instruments that could damage the candelabra. It is preferable to use non-drip candles. Important: do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents containing even small quantities of acetone, trichloroethylene and ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: Abbracciaio Candle Holder
all-products.Body:
Abbracciaio is an aluminium casting of two shapes which, when placed one in front of the other, become a loving embrace. The two structures composing the candelabra link together giving the piece stability.

Designed by Philippe Starck

Materials: Galvanized or Painted Aluminium

all-products.Name: Air Du Temps Clock
all-products.Body:
Lightness is the watchword of the table clock "Air du Temps" inhabited by hollows and light. Its aerial shape and its clean and essential design allow time to elapse suspended on a smooth and sparkling surface. A simple elegant object that fits perfectly into any setting.

Designed by Eugeni Quitllet

Materials: Transparent, mass dyed or metallized thermoplastic technopolymer

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergent diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: Alessandro M. Corkscrew
all-products.Body:
A design self-portrait created by Alessandro Mendini, the Alessandro M. corkscrew returns dressed in a new chromatic range invented by its author. Dedicated to the collectors of Alessandro Mendini’s work and of his ‘quick-change' corkscrews, and for those wishing to uncork a fine wine with a tool combining function and emotion.

Designed by Alessandro Mendini

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and chrome-plated zamak

Care: Use a damp cloth or sponge with a non-abrasive detergent. Do not wash in the dishwasher

A desk organizer designed to resemble Alex Proba’s iconic patterns and murals. Each shape is an intentional celebration of color meant to bring life and energy to your workspace. Assemble them to create your desired desktop arrangement.

Designed by Alex Proba in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Stoneware

Care: Hand wash with warm water and gentle soap or wipe with soft cloth.

all-products.Name: Assembly Desk Vessel
all-products.Body:

Designed by Alex Proba in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Stoneware

Care: Hand wash with warm water and gentle soap or wipe with soft cloth.

all-products.Name: Birillo Bathroom Waste Bin
all-products.Body:
The family of objects for the bathroom Birillo has been designed by Piero Lissoni and it is part of the family of object for the Bathroom Birillo. The balance between the minimal shape and the used materials is the main characteristic of this project. The entire range of product is minimal and essential thanks to its rectangular shape and very well finished with it's rounded edges. The objects are simple but never dull.

Designed by Piero Lissoni

Materials: White PMMA

Care: Hand wash

all-products.Name: Blip Spoon Rest
all-products.Body:
Sinuous shapes form an elegant, functional object: Blip is the spoon rest designed to cradle spoons and ladles of different lengths and sizes. The name alludes onomatopoeically to the wave from a drop in water.

Materials: 18/10 stainless steel

all-products.Name: Bold Stripe Shag Door Mat
all-products.Body:
Tufted, trusted, and tough. This easy-care floor mat combines a graphic pattern and inviting texture with enduring performance, indoors or out.

With the sturdiness of an all-weather doormat and the plush good looks of a rug, Shag mats bring texture and traction to any space. They are made by tufting TerraStrand yarns onto a primary backing and then bonding this looped top layer to a sturdy, slip-resistant base of hardworking vinyl, eliminating the need for a rug pad.

Made to retain their rich textures and distinctive hues through many years of use, Shag mats are quick to dry, free of phthalates, and resistant to staining, fading, mold, mildew, and chlorine. They are ideal for entryways, mudrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, porches, patios, pool areas, and beyond.

Materials: Tufted, crush-proof texture created by looped vinyl yarns. Resistant to mold, mildew, and chlorine and waterproof, non-skid vinyl backing; no rug pad needed.

Use: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Shake out, vacuum, or hose off and hang to quickly dry

Made in the USA

all-products.Name: Boxy Soap Dish
all-products.Body:
From the Boxy Collection, a range of sleek and minimalistic bathroom accessories. This dish offers sophisticated storage for your favourite bar of soap!

Designed by Ludovica & Roberto Palomba

Materials: Batch coloured thermoplastic and techno plastic

Usage: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: City Blanket
all-products.Body:
Ingunn Birkeland is an Oslo-based fashion designer known for her unique handmade woven square patterns in combination with her very own specific palette of pastels and fluorescing colours.

The City series is Birkeland´s colorful and vibrant interpretation of one of her signature patterns, executed in a brushed jacquard quality.

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: City Blanket
all-products.Body:
Ingunn Birkeland is an Oslo-based fashion designer known for her unique handmade woven square patterns in combination with her very own specific palette of pastels and fluorescing colours.

The City series is Birkeland´s colorful and vibrant interpretation of one of her signature patterns, executed in a brushed jacquard quality.

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Componibili 2-Tier Storage Unit
all-products.Body:
The Componibili 2-Tier Storage Unit is a timeless furnishing classic that continues to be the perfect addition to any contemporary home.

This sleek and stylish storage unit combines form and function to create a compact piece of furniture that will elevate the look of any space - whether it be a bedroom, living room, or even a bathroom. The two compartments with smooth sliding doors provide easy, clean access to your hidden belongings.

Designed By: Anna Castelli Ferrieri in 1967

Materials: Batch-dyed ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general) and do not stand on the product or use the product as a ladder.

Made in Milan, Italy.

all-products.Name: Componibili Bio 3-Tier Storage Unit
all-products.Body:
Componibili Bio originates from a 50 year-old series of symbolic storage units which have been produced in a new version with a revolutionary sustainable material. Ongoing research and innovation in industrial processes have enabled the Componibili Bio to be produced with a biopolymer made from renewable raw materials, derived from non-GMO agricultural waste not intended for the food chain.

The product has obtained international TÜV Austria certification with the maximum star rating and, as a designer product, will only gain value over time.

Available with a fixed, non-stackable, three element structure in a soft touch effect matte finish.

Designed by Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Biomaterial from a renewable source

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: Componibili Smile 2-Tier Storage Unit
all-products.Body:
Fabio Novembre re-interprets the icon created by Anna Castelli Ferrieri: Componibili’s classic round hole has been reinterpreted into a winking eye, a nod to the emojis of today. The timeless classic acquires a playful new interpretation that fits perfectly into children’s spaces.

This is a cylindrical Componibili with a fixed, 2-level structure.

Designed by Fabio Novembre as a tribute to Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Batch-Dyed or Painted ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: Concrete Desk Set
all-products.Body:
Getting organized is often as simple as having the right tools. The Concrete Desk Set is a great way to ensure that everything has its place and stays there. Cast from solid concrete, this set includes a small tape dispenser, pencil holder, and a small tray.

Designed by Magnus Pettersen in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Gray concrete

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

all-products.Name: Corduroy Sink Cup
all-products.Body:
A collection of sink-friendly accessories inspired by Helen Levi’s Corduroy tile collection. Featuring the same ribbed texture as its namesake, and translated into everyday objects for the kitchen, bathroom or wherever else you might wash up.

Designed by Helen Levi in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Dolomite

Care: Handwash with warm, soapy water. Do not use bleach.

all-products.Name: Domino Stripe Shag Door Mat
all-products.Body:
Inspired by the sharp contrast and mesmerizing motion of a cascading row of dominoes, the variegated striped of this easy-care floor mat are at once dynamic and serene. Lines of varying widths create an ombré effect that is heightened when viewed at a distance.

With the sturdiness of an all-weather doormat and the plush good looks of a rug, Shag mats bring texture and traction to any space. They are made by tufting TerraStrand yarns onto a primary backing and then bonding this looped top layer to a sturdy, slip-resistant base of hardworking vinyl, eliminating the need for a rug pad.

Made to retain their rich textures and distinctive hues through many years of use, Shag mats are quick to dry, free of phthalates, and resistant to staining, fading, mold, mildew, and chlorine. They are ideal for entryways, mudrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, porches, patios, pool areas, and beyond.

Materials: Tufted, crush-proof texture created by looped vinyl yarns. Resistant to mold, mildew, and chlorine and waterproof, non-skid vinyl backing; no rug pad needed.

Use: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Shake out, vacuum, or hose off and hang to quickly dry

Made in the USA

all-products.Name: Dune Coasters
all-products.Body:
A set of four terracotta coasters reminiscent of the rippled sand dunes in the American southwest. Their ridged design keeps your favorite drinks steady and surfaces protected. Arrange all four together to make a trivet for your kitchen or tabletop. Dune Coasters are cork-backed and come in four different glazes; blue, black, pink, and green.

Designed by Ben Medansky in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Glazed terracotta

Care: Wipe clean with damp cloth.

all-products.Name: Fade Stripe Shag Door Mat

all-products.Name: Goober Candle
all-products.Body:
The Goober Candle is cast in unscented paraffin wax from playful forms. Each Goober has a distinctive shape and character.

Designed by Talbot and Yoon in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: 100% paraffin wax

Care/Instructions: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Burn time for Green and Blue Goobers is approximately 24 hours. Burn time for Pink and Purple Goobers is approximately 40 hours.

all-products.Name: Goober Candle Mini Set
all-products.Body:
The next generation of Goobers is here. Akin to their parentals, each baby Goober boasts its own playful shape and distinct personality, just in miniature form. Their littleness is so endearing, you may find yourself calling them by name: Ba, Ma, La, and Da. Like a lil’ rascal, do not leave a lit candle unattended.

Set of 4 miniature candles

Designed by Talbot and Yoon in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: 100% paraffin wax

Care/Instructions: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Burn time for each ranges from approximately 11 to 17 hours.

all-products.Name: Grind Salt and Pepper Grinder
all-products.Body:
The original Grind salt, pepper and spices grinder is ideal for those who like to cook their own dishes, appreciating the fragrance of a freshly ground spice. An expressive design for everyday use, transformed into an elegant, indispensable complement to be placed on the table. This salt and pepper grinder makes the perfect table centerpiece.

Ingeniously designed, this grinder has the grind placed at the top of the grinder, so no traces are left on the surfaces after use. A sophisticated addition to any interior, this grinder also makes a great gift idea for fine food lovers and budding chefs.

Designed by: William Alsop & Federico Grazzini

Materials: Aluminum casting & ceramic

Care: When refilling the grinder, take a soft brush and wipe away any residue dust from the bottom, as well as the neck. Adjust the coarseness to your liking, and grind away.

all-products.Name: Hand Hooks
all-products.Body:
The Reality series by Harry Allen is inspired by the beauty of everyday objects. By casting natural forms, Allen thoughtfully reimagines objects and gives them new uses. Each object is chosen with care and often a comic sensibility. Here, four casts of the designer’s hand provide a unique take on the idea of a shelf, vase and hook.  

Includes wall mounting hardware.

Designed by Harry Allen in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Marble, resin, glass, & stainless steel

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

all-products.Name: Heathered Shag Door Mat
all-products.Body:
In a carefully calculated balance of tones, this easy-care floor mat fits seamlessly into a variety of styles.

With the sturdiness of an all-weather doormat and the plush good looks of a rug, Shag mats bring texture and traction to any space. They are made by tufting TerraStrand yarns onto a primary backing and then bonding this looped top layer to a sturdy, slip-resistant base of hardworking vinyl, eliminating the need for a rug pad.

Made to retain their rich textures and distinctive hues through many years of use, Shag mats are quick to dry, free of phthalates, and resistant to staining, fading, mold, mildew, and chlorine. They are ideal for entryways, mudrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, porches, patios, pool areas, and beyond.

Materials: Tufted, crush-proof texture created by looped vinyl yarns. Resistant to mold, mildew, and chlorine and waterproof, non-skid vinyl backing; no rug pad needed.

Use: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Shake out, vacuum, or hose off and hang to quickly dry

Made in the USA

all-products.Name: Honey I'm Home Beeswax Candles
all-products.Body:
A set of beeswax taper candles attached at the wick and hand-dipped with a bit of honey. They’ll add a light sweetness to the air and a touch of color to your home, making these tapers rather buzzworthy.
Materials: Beeswax & honey scent
Care: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Do not allow candles to burn within 2 inches of the surface of the candle holder. Burn time is approximately 8.5 hours.
Designed in Brooklyn, NYC

all-products.Name: Ida Blanket
all-products.Body:
The new Ida design draws inspiration from patchwork and hand made tapestries. Initially A&V made a full scale model of the design from coloured paper, and the traces of the hand through small imperfections and irregularities were preserved and brought into the woven fabric.

Designed By: Anderssen & Voll

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Iron Tray
all-products.Body:
An iron tray for holding anything from candles to key rings. Its raised and folded edge creates the illusion that it is floating just above the surface it’s placed upon. The edge also makes it easy to grasp and pick up.

Designed by Josh Owens in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Cast iron

Care: To clean, wipe with a soft cloth and a touch of olive oil.

all-products.Name: Jellies Large Coat Hangers
all-products.Body:
The Jellies Coat Hangers, draw their inspiration from the forms used in traditional pastry-making. They are the perfect mix of form and function, delivering sculptural elements and practical storage solutions. Whether you use them in the entryway, bedroom, or closet, these Coat Hangers are sure to impress with their unique design and usefulness.

Available in three sizes/patterns and five different colors, the Jellies Coat Hangers will add a pop of color wherever they hang.

Designed By: Patricia Urquiola

Materials:
Wall Base: Polycarbonate
Coat Rack: Transparent or mass-dyed thermoplastic technopolymer

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy.

Available in three sizes/patterns and five different colors, the Jellies Coat Hangers will add a pop of color wherever they hang.

Designed By: Patricia Urquiola

Materials:
Wall Base: Polycarbonate
Coat Rack: Transparent or mass-dyed thermoplastic technopolymer

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy.

all-products.Name: Juicy Salif Citrus Squeezer
all-products.Body:
The Alessi Juicy Salif Citrus Squeezer is an icon of revolutionary kitchenware. Not just a striking design, this juice squeezer is surprisingly functional. Made from a mirror polished and durable aluminium, its long, spider-like legs are tall enough to fit your glass underneath - ready to collect your lemon, orange or lime juice. The simplistic yet unforgettable form came to the designer on a pizzeria napkin during a seaside holiday in Italy.

Designed by Philippe Starck

Materials: Aluminum casting, mirror-polished

Care: Hand wash immediately after use and dry with a soft cloth. Not dishwasher safe.

all-products.Name: Kirby Vase
all-products.Body:
A Kirby is a ceramic vase for floral arrangements, small bouquets, or a simple stem. Available in three shapes, each with a distinct personality. Think of it as a best bud vase to keep you company.

Designed by Talbot and Yoon in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Glazed stoneware

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

all-products.Name: Kitchen Timer
all-products.Body:
Graves's personal style blends ideas taken from European tradition, Art Deco, American Pop Art and memories of pre-Colombian cultures. The American designer also has an ability to bewitch the general public like few other designers. 

Whether timing a soft-boiled egg or cooking pasta al dente, the Kitchen Timer is both precise and stylish.

Designed by Michael Graves

Materials: Thermoplastic resin

Care/Instructions: Turn dial all the way to 60 and then turn back to desired time

all-products.Name: Knut Blanket
all-products.Body:
The Knut series draws inspiration from the most⁠ elementary process in weaving, the actual⁠ binding of the vertical and horizontal⁠ threads. The pattern is a tight and precise⁠
grid, drawn in saturated colors.⁠

Designed By: Hallgeir Homstvedt

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Body:

all-products.Name: Kvam Blanket
all-products.Body:
The Kvam series is characterized by its playful geometry, which is based on the possibilities and limitations of jacquard weave. The motif clearly relates to the weave's horizontal and vertical directions, while the diagonal lines create rhythm and dynamics. The pattern can be associated with both Norwegian and Japanese motifs.

Designed By: Kristine Five Melvær

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade in Norway

Designed by Miriam Mirri

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and 18/10 stainless steel

Care: Hand wash only

all-products.Name: Lynild Blanket
all-products.Body:
Lynild is Norwegian for "fire stitch" – a textile pattern that reaches all the way back to medieval times. Anderssen & Voll are reviving this traditional pattern with vibrant gradients in a pattern inspired by mountain landscapes.

Designed By: Anderssen & Voll

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Match Striker
all-products.Body:
A simple vessel for holding a handful of strike-anywhere wooden matches, which will ignite when struck against the surface. Place used matches in the dish to cool. Match markings can be removed with a touch of olive oil.

Please Note: Requires the use of strike-anywhere matches. We recommend the Diamond Strike Anywhere "Greenlight" Matches.

Designed by Josh Owen in Brooklyn, NYC.

Materials: Cast iron

Care: Remove match markings with a soft cloth and a touch of olive oil.

all-products.Name: Mikkel Blanket
all-products.Body:
The Mikkel series was launched at the ICFF in New York back in 2015, and was awarded best textile at the ICFF editors awards. The motifs combines a geometric pattern inspired by the Bauhaus movement and Norwegian weaving traditions with a modern and contemporary use of colors.

Designed By: Kristine Five Melvær

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Mini Planet Lamp
all-products.Body:
The Mini Planet Lamp weaves a melody of love on plastic by harmonizing transparent light and auroral creation.

Designed by Tokujin Yoshioka

Materials: : Diffuser in transparent or mass-dyed PMMA. Base in metallic finish ABS

Light Source: 1.6W 100-240V 50/60Hz

Care: Before cleaning the product, ensure that it is unplugged. Clean the product with a soft damp cloth soaked in soap or a neutral liquid detergent, preferably diluted in water. Avoid contact between liquids and electrical components. Avoid the use of ethyl alcohol or detergents containing even small quantities of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: Moon Blanket
all-products.Body:
With the Moon throw, von Zweigbergk wanted to explore the reversibility of woven patterns. Using a gradient between two contrasting colours, the design reminds of the moon or the sun, emphasizing the throw’s duality. It can also be read as a play between a convex and concave shape.

The Moon throws comes in four colourways where each colour explores the celestial shades of the sun and moon. From the soft pastels seen in the morning to the clear bright colors seen during the night.

Designed By: Clara von Zweigbergk

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Pleated Pitcher
all-products.Body:
A sculptural water pitcher with a pleated form and arched handle, designed to be admired beyond its functional use. Display it as an objet d'art—and as an enticing reminder to drink your eight cups a day. Pitcher holds 60 oz. of your favorite beverage.

Designed by High Gloss in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Glazed stoneware

Care: Hand wash only

all-products.Name: Plissé Jug
all-products.Body:
Concise geometric lines and an attentive composition of the elements, inspired by the worlds of fashion and architecture. Its three-dimensional surface resembles pleated fabric, and it has a dynamic, sculptural silhouette.

Lightweight and easy to use, the Plissé thermo insulating jug does not hide how practical it is, integrating this with an iconic and timeless shape, it is well suited for serving coffee, tea as well as cold drinks, and its double wall thermal glass inside helps to keep drinks at the desired temperature for longer.

Designed by Michele De Lucchi

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and double-walled thermal glass

Care: Handwash

all-products.Name: Plissé Kettle
all-products.Body:
The Plissé electric kettle combines functional aspects with a plastic and fascinating design that reveals the creator's architectural background, as well as his passion for the handicraft and for sculpture. Like a fabric that a thick pleating transforms into a three-dimensional shape, this kettle is reminiscent of an haute couture dress, a beautiful object to be left on display on your kitchen top.

With 1500 watts for quick boiling, a removable filter for easy cleaning, an automatic shut-off, and a cord-free base, the Plissé Electric Kettle is as functional as it is beautiful. 

Designed by Michele De Lucchi in Italy

Materials: Thermoplastic resin

all-products.Name: Plissé Toaster
all-products.Body:
The Plissé toaster elegant design together with its pleated surface exhorts you to display it on the kitchen counter. The numerous functions the toaster is equipped with make it easy and safe to use and its six browning levels suit every taste.

  • 850W
  • Optional Toaster Racks allow slices of bread to be easily inserted into and removed from the toaster.
  • 6 browning levels can be easily adjusted with the relevant button.
  • "Bagel" function allows just one side of the bread to be toasted.
  • Non-slip base, ensuring stability during use.

Designed by Michele De Lucchi in Italy

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and stainless steel

Care: Clean the outer surface with a damp cloth and dry carefully. Do not flip the toaster upside down or shake it, rather remove the crumbs from the collection tray located near the base of the toaster. Before putting the toaster away, always allow it to cool completely and be sure to wind the cable around the winder and not around the body of the appliance.

all-products.Name: Plissé Toaster
all-products.Body:
The Plissé toaster elegant design together with its pleated surface exhorts you to display it on the kitchen counter. The numerous functions the toaster is equipped with make it easy and safe to use and its six browning levels suit every taste.

  • 850W
  • Optional Toaster Racks allow slices of bread to be easily inserted into and removed from the toaster.
  • 6 browning levels can be easily adjusted with the relevant button.
  • "Bagel" function allows just one side of the bread to be toasted.
  • Non-slip base, ensuring stability during use.

Designed by Michele De Lucchi in Italy

all-products.Name: Pop Stripe Shag Door Mat
all-products.Body:
Bringing together bold hues, dynamic lines, and tufted texture, the lively stripes of this easy-care floor mat reimagine the rainbow. Bands of color are softened by their interplay with white, creating a surface that can complement a range of palettes and styles.

With the sturdiness of an all-weather doormat and the plush good looks of a rug, Shag mats bring texture and traction to any space. They are made by tufting TerraStrand yarns onto a primary backing and then bonding this looped top layer to a sturdy, slip-resistant base of hardworking vinyl, eliminating the need for a rug pad.

Made to retain their rich textures and distinctive hues through many years of use, Shag mats are quick to dry, free of phthalates, and resistant to staining, fading, mold, mildew, and chlorine. They are ideal for entryways, mudrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, porches, patios, pool areas, and beyond.

Materials: Tufted, crush-proof texture created by looped vinyl yarns. Resistant to mold, mildew, and chlorine and waterproof, non-skid vinyl backing; no rug pad needed.

Use: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Shake out, vacuum, or hose off and hang to quickly dry

Made in the USA

all-products.Name: Poppy Candle and Incense Holder
all-products.Body:
A 2-in-1 holder for burning candles or incense. Turn it bud-side-up to burn incense or bloom-side-up to burn a candle. Made of concrete and painted in bright colors, they’re weighty but buoyant all at once.

Materials: Cement, paint, stainless steel plate & brass sleeve

Care: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Do not allow candles to burn within 2 inches of the surface of the candle holder. Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth. 

Designed in Brooklyn, NYC

all-products.Name: Scape Tray Set
all-products.Body:
A set of trays made up of abstract lines and shapes that depict familiar landscapes of the outdoors. Like little habitats, they offer a home for your small belongings to live in. Nest them together when not in use.

Designed by Steven Bukowski in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Powder-coated steel

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

all-products.Name: Serving Friends
all-products.Body:
Whoever said food isn’t to be played with hasn’t met Serving Friends. These wooden spoons, carved into charming shapes, bring joy and humor to your dining table. No matter what you’re serving, they'll always be there to serve up smile.

Designed by Selena Liu in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Oiled beech wood

Care: Hand wash with mild soap, then rinse and dry thoroughly. Keep in a dry location at room temperature. Do not soak or put them in the dishwasher as this will dry out the wood. Apply a mineral oil or olive oil to remove marks or whenever your Serving Friends feel dry. Rub with a wedge of lemon to keep them fresh and prevent bacteria. Safe to use with nonstick cooking surfaces.

The Syndin series is a playful take on classic, geometrical shapes, with colors inspired by the nature of the beautiful mountain area of Syndin, Norway.

Designed By: Kristine Five Melvær

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Take Lamp
all-products.Body:
The shape of Take is the result of the joining of two specular parts: two flat, rectangular sheets which, from being two-dimensional at the centre, take on the shape and volume of a "semi-lamp". The internal pleating of the diffuser embellishes the object, creating, when lit, a play of reflections.

Designed by: Ferruccio Laviani 

Materials: New 2.0 transparent or mass-dyed polycarbonate, a material that uses renewable feedstock from the pulp and paper industry in the synthesis phase

Care: Disconnect the lamp from the power supply and clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy.

all-products.Body:
The Tigrito Cat Bowl is a fun pet accessory that will make both you and your kitty happy. Featuring two bowls with an adorable cat-shaped handle, this playful cat bowl sits well on any floor.

Designed by Miriam Mirri

Materials: Thermoplastic resin and 18/10 stainless steel

Care: Hand wash only

all-products.Name: Toskaft Blanket
all-products.Body:
The blanket Toskaft was designed based on the theme past-present, and inspiration was found in a photograph of curtains designed by Annelise Knudtzon for Røros Tweed in the 1970s. Polmar was inspired by the simple and straightforward fabric, and attracted to it's everyday expression.

Polmar's design is based on classical weaving techniques, translated into a contemporary and clean expression. The stitches work as building blocks, or pixels, in a graphic composition. The different color versions provide the same pattern with very different looks, from discreet neutrals to more colorful and playful.

Designed By: Sara Wright Polmar

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

all-products.Name: Toy Lamp
all-products.Body:
The iconic bear of Moschino becomes the Toy table lamp that interprets a playful, irreverent and colourful style. The glamour and glimmer of the iconic teddy bear may quickly become a furnishing favourite.

Designed by Moschino design by Jeremy Scott

Materials: Batch coloured painted or metallized thermoplastic technopolymer

Light Source: 1.2W 100-240V 50/60Hz

Care: Disconnect the lamp from the power supply and clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy

all-products.Name: Turtle Box
all-products.Body:
The Reality series by Harry Allen is inspired by the beauty of everyday objects. By casting natural forms, Allen thoughtfully reimagines objects and gives them new uses. Each object is chosen with care and often a comic sensibility. The Box Turtle Box was cast from a turtle that died of natural causes. Its shell opens to reveal a secret compartment for storing small objects.

Designed by Harry Allen in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Marble & resin

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

all-products.Name: Virgula Divina Bottle Opener
all-products.Body:
The Virgula Divina bottle opener recalls the enigmatic Y-shaped rod, the dowser's divination tool in his search for hidden treasures, in both name and form. A perfect drawing transformed into a practical bottle opener.

Designed by Frédéric Gooris

Material: Mirror-polished 18/10 stainless steel

Care: Dishwasher safe

all-products.Name: Wall Clothes Hook

Materials: Transparent or batch-dyed polycarbonate

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy

areaware.Body:

Designed by Helen Levi in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Dolomite

Care: Handwash with warm, soapy water. Do not use bleach.

areaware.Name: Assembly Desk Set
areaware.Body:

Designed by Alex Proba in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Stoneware

Care: Hand wash with warm water and gentle soap or wipe with soft cloth.

Care/Instructions: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Burn time for Green and Blue Goobers is approximately 24 hours. Burn time for Pink and Purple Goobers is approximately 40 hours.

areaware.Name: Concrete Desk Set
areaware.Body:
Getting organized is often as simple as having the right tools. The Concrete Desk Set is a great way to ensure that everything has its place and stays there. Cast from solid concrete, this set includes a small tape dispenser, pencil holder, and a small tray.

Designed by Magnus Pettersen in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Gray concrete

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

areaware.Name: Pleated Pitcher
areaware.Body:
A sculptural water pitcher with a pleated form and arched handle, designed to be admired beyond its functional use. Display it as an objet d'art—and as an enticing reminder to drink your eight cups a day. Pitcher holds 60 oz. of your favorite beverage.

Designed by High Gloss in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Glazed stoneware

Care: Hand wash only

areaware.Name: Scape Tray Set
areaware.Body:
A set of trays made up of abstract lines and shapes that depict familiar landscapes of the outdoors. Like little habitats, they offer a home for your small belongings to live in. Nest them together when not in use.

Designed by Steven Bukowski in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Powder-coated steel

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

areaware.Name: Serving Friends
areaware.Body:
Whoever said food isn’t to be played with hasn’t met Serving Friends. These wooden spoons, carved into charming shapes, bring joy and humor to your dining table. No matter what you’re serving, they'll always be there to serve up smile.

Designed by Selena Liu in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Oiled beech wood

Care: Hand wash with mild soap, then rinse and dry thoroughly. Keep in a dry location at room temperature. Do not soak or put them in the dishwasher as this will dry out the wood. Apply a mineral oil or olive oil to remove marks or whenever your Serving Friends feel dry. Rub with a wedge of lemon to keep them fresh and prevent bacteria. Safe to use with nonstick cooking surfaces.

areaware.Name: Hand Hooks
areaware.Body:
The Reality series by Harry Allen is inspired by the beauty of everyday objects. By casting natural forms, Allen thoughtfully reimagines objects and gives them new uses. Each object is chosen with care and often a comic sensibility. Here, four casts of the designer’s hand provide a unique take on the idea of a shelf, vase and hook.  

Includes wall mounting hardware.

Designed by Harry Allen in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Marble, resin, glass, & stainless steel

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

areaware.Name: Corduroy Soap Dispenser
areaware.Body:
A collection of sink-friendly accessories inspired by Helen Levi’s Corduroy tile collection. Featuring the same ribbed texture as its namesake, and translated into everyday objects for the kitchen, bathroom or wherever else you might wash up.

Designed by Helen Levi in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Dolomite

Care: Handwash with warm, soapy water. Do not use bleach.

areaware.Name: Iron Tray
areaware.Body:
An iron tray for holding anything from candles to key rings. Its raised and folded edge creates the illusion that it is floating just above the surface it’s placed upon. The edge also makes it easy to grasp and pick up.

Designed by Josh Owens in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Cast iron

Care: To clean, wipe with a soft cloth and a touch of olive oil.

areaware.Name: Iron Tray
areaware.Body:

areaware.Name: Assembly Desk Vessel
areaware.Body:
A vessel for your desktop designed to resemble shapes found in Alex Proba’s iconic patterns and murals. This vessel can hold anything from pens to flowers-whatever will bring life and energy to your workspace.

Designed by Alex Proba in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Stoneware

Care: Hand wash with warm water and gentle soap or wipe with soft cloth.

areaware.Name: Dune Coasters
areaware.Body:
A set of four terracotta coasters reminiscent of the rippled sand dunes in the American southwest. Their ridged design keeps your favorite drinks steady and surfaces protected. Arrange all four together to make a trivet for your kitchen or tabletop. Dune Coasters are cork-backed and come in four different glazes; blue, black, pink, and green.

Designed by Ben Medansky in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Glazed terracotta

Care: Wipe clean with damp cloth.

areaware.Name: Match Striker
areaware.Body:
A simple vessel for holding a handful of strike-anywhere wooden matches, which will ignite when struck against the surface. Place used matches in the dish to cool. Match markings can be removed with a touch of olive oil.

Please Note: Requires the use of strike-anywhere matches. We recommend the Diamond Strike Anywhere "Greenlight" Matches.

Designed by Josh Owen in Brooklyn, NYC.

Materials: Cast iron

Care: Remove match markings with a soft cloth and a touch of olive oil.

areaware.Name: Honey I'm Home Beeswax Candles
areaware.Body:
A set of beeswax taper candles attached at the wick and hand-dipped with a bit of honey. They’ll add a light sweetness to the air and a touch of color to your home, making these tapers rather buzzworthy.
Materials: Beeswax & honey scent
Care: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Do not allow candles to burn within 2 inches of the surface of the candle holder. Burn time is approximately 8.5 hours.
Designed in Brooklyn, NYC

areaware.Name: Goober Candle Mini Set
areaware.Body:
The next generation of Goobers is here. Akin to their parentals, each baby Goober boasts its own playful shape and distinct personality, just in miniature form. Their littleness is so endearing, you may find yourself calling them by name: Ba, Ma, La, and Da. Like a lil’ rascal, do not leave a lit candle unattended.

Set of 4 miniature candles

Designed by Talbot and Yoon in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: 100% paraffin wax

Care/Instructions: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Burn time for each ranges from approximately 11 to 17 hours.

areaware.Name: Turtle Box
areaware.Body:
The Reality series by Harry Allen is inspired by the beauty of everyday objects. By casting natural forms, Allen thoughtfully reimagines objects and gives them new uses. Each object is chosen with care and often a comic sensibility. The Box Turtle Box was cast from a turtle that died of natural causes. Its shell opens to reveal a secret compartment for storing small objects.

Designed by Harry Allen in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Marble & resin

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

areaware.Name: Kirby Vase
areaware.Body:
A Kirby is a ceramic vase for floral arrangements, small bouquets, or a simple stem. Available in three shapes, each with a distinct personality. Think of it as a best bud vase to keep you company.

Designed by Talbot and Yoon in Brooklyn, NYC

Materials: Glazed stoneware

Care: Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth.

areaware.Name: Kirby Vase

chilewich.Name: Domino Stripe Shag Utility Mat
chilewich.Body:
Inspired by the sharp contrast and mesmerizing motion of a cascading row of dominoes, the variegated striped of this easy-care floor mat are at once dynamic and serene. Lines of varying widths create an ombré effect that is heightened when viewed at a distance.

With the sturdiness of an all-weather doormat and the plush good looks of a rug, Shag mats bring texture and traction to any space. They are made by tufting TerraStrand yarns onto a primary backing and then bonding this looped top layer to a sturdy, slip-resistant base of hardworking vinyl, eliminating the need for a rug pad.

Made to retain their rich textures and distinctive hues through many years of use, Shag mats are quick to dry, free of phthalates, and resistant to staining, fading, mold, mildew, and chlorine. They are ideal for entryways, mudrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, porches, patios, pool areas, and beyond.

Materials: Tufted, crush-proof texture created by looped vinyl yarns. Resistant to mold, mildew, and chlorine and waterproof, non-skid vinyl backing; no rug pad needed.

Use: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Shake out, vacuum, or hose off and hang to quickly dry

Made in the USA

chilewich.Name: Heathered Shag Door Mat
chilewich.Body:
In a carefully calculated balance of tones, this easy-care floor mat fits seamlessly into a variety of styles.

With the sturdiness of an all-weather doormat and the plush good looks of a rug, Shag mats bring texture and traction to any space. They are made by tufting TerraStrand yarns onto a primary backing and then bonding this looped top layer to a sturdy, slip-resistant base of hardworking vinyl, eliminating the need for a rug pad.

Made to retain their rich textures and distinctive hues through many years of use, Shag mats are quick to dry, free of phthalates, and resistant to staining, fading, mold, mildew, and chlorine. They are ideal for entryways, mudrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, porches, patios, pool areas, and beyond.

Materials: Tufted, crush-proof texture created by looped vinyl yarns. Resistant to mold, mildew, and chlorine and waterproof, non-skid vinyl backing; no rug pad needed.

Use: Indoor/Outdoor

Care: Shake out, vacuum, or hose off and hang to quickly dry

Made in the USA

kartell.Name: Mini Planet Lamp
kartell.Body:
The Mini Planet Lamp weaves a melody of love on plastic by harmonizing transparent light and auroral creation.

Designed by Tokujin Yoshioka

Materials: : Diffuser in transparent or mass-dyed PMMA. Base in metallic finish ABS

Light Source: 1.6W 100-240V 50/60Hz

Care: Before cleaning the product, ensure that it is unplugged. Clean the product with a soft damp cloth soaked in soap or a neutral liquid detergent, preferably diluted in water. Avoid contact between liquids and electrical components. Avoid the use of ethyl alcohol or detergents containing even small quantities of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell.Name: Toy Lamp
kartell.Body:
The iconic bear of Moschino becomes the Toy table lamp that interprets a playful, irreverent and colourful style. The glamour and glimmer of the iconic teddy bear may quickly become a furnishing favourite.

Designed by Moschino design by Jeremy Scott

Materials: Batch coloured painted or metallized thermoplastic technopolymer

Light Source: 1.2W 100-240V 50/60Hz

Care: Disconnect the lamp from the power supply and clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell.Name: Abbracciaio Candle Holder
kartell.Body:
Abbracciaio is an aluminium casting of two shapes which, when placed one in front of the other, become a loving embrace. The two structures composing the candelabra link together giving the piece stability.

Designed by Philippe Starck

Materials: Galvanized or Painted Aluminium

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth with soap or liquid detergent, preferably diluted in water. To remove candle wax from the candelabra, run hot tap water over it until the wax has completely melted. Do not use abrasive sponges or other instruments that could damage the candelabra. It is preferable to use non-drip candles. Important: do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents containing even small quantities of acetone, trichloroethylene and ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell.Name: Air Du Temps Clock
kartell.Body:
Lightness is the watchword of the table clock "Air du Temps" inhabited by hollows and light. Its aerial shape and its clean and essential design allow time to elapse suspended on a smooth and sparkling surface. A simple elegant object that fits perfectly into any setting.

Designed by Eugeni Quitllet

Materials: Transparent, mass dyed or metallized thermoplastic technopolymer

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergent diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell.Name: Componibili Smile 2-Tier Storage Unit
kartell.Body:
Fabio Novembre re-interprets the icon created by Anna Castelli Ferrieri: Componibili’s classic round hole has been reinterpreted into a winking eye, a nod to the emojis of today. The timeless classic acquires a playful new interpretation that fits perfectly into children’s spaces.

This is a cylindrical Componibili with a fixed, 2-level structure.

Designed by Fabio Novembre as a tribute to Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Batch-Dyed or Painted ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell.Name: Componibili Bio 3-Tier Storage Unit
kartell.Body:
Componibili Bio originates from a 50 year-old series of symbolic storage units which have been produced in a new version with a revolutionary sustainable material. Ongoing research and innovation in industrial processes have enabled the Componibili Bio to be produced with a biopolymer made from renewable raw materials, derived from non-GMO agricultural waste not intended for the food chain.

The product has obtained international TÜV Austria certification with the maximum star rating and, as a designer product, will only gain value over time.

Available with a fixed, non-stackable, three element structure in a soft touch effect matte finish.

Designed by Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Biomaterial from a renewable source

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell.Name: Componibili 4-Tier Storage Unit
kartell.Body:
The Componibili 4-Tier Storage Unit is a timeless furnishing classic that continues to be the perfect addition to any contemporary home.

This sleek and stylish storage unit combines form and function to create a compact piece of furniture that will elevate the look of any space - whether it be a bedroom, living room, or even a bathroom. The four compartments with smooth sliding doors provide easy, clean access to your hidden belongings.

Designed By: Anna Castelli Ferrieri in 1967

Materials: Batch-dyed ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general) and do not stand on the product or use the product as a ladder.

Made in Milan, Italy.

kartell.Name: Take Lamp
kartell.Body:
The shape of Take is the result of the joining of two specular parts: two flat, rectangular sheets which, from being two-dimensional at the centre, take on the shape and volume of a "semi-lamp". The internal pleating of the diffuser embellishes the object, creating, when lit, a play of reflections.

Designed by: Ferruccio Laviani 

Materials: New 2.0 transparent or mass-dyed polycarbonate, a material that uses renewable feedstock from the pulp and paper industry in the synthesis phase

Care: Disconnect the lamp from the power supply and clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general).

Made in Milan, Italy.

kartell.Name: Jellies Small Coat Hangers
kartell.Body:
The Jellies Coat Hangers, draw their inspiration from the forms used in traditional pastry-making. They are the perfect mix of form and function, delivering sculptural elements and practical storage solutions. Whether you use them in the entryway, bedroom, or closet, these Coat Hangers are sure to impress with their unique design and usefulness.

Available in three sizes/patterns and five different colors, the Jellies Coat Hangers will add a pop of color wherever they hang.

Designed By: Patricia Urquiola

Materials:
Wall Base: Polycarbonate
Coat Rack: Transparent or mass-dyed thermoplastic technopolymer

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy.

kartell.Name: Jellies Medium Coat Hangers
kartell.Body:
The Jellies Coat Hangers, draw their inspiration from the forms used in traditional pastry-making. They are the perfect mix of form and function, delivering sculptural elements and practical storage solutions. Whether you use them in the entryway, bedroom, or closet, these Coat Hangers are sure to impress with their unique design and usefulness.

Available in three sizes/patterns and five different colors, the Jellies Coat Hangers will add a pop of color wherever they hang.

Designed By: Patricia Urquiola

Materials:
Wall Base: Polycarbonate
Coat Rack: Transparent or mass-dyed thermoplastic technopolymer

Care: Clean the product with a soft damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohols or detergents containing even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene, ammonia and solvents in general.

Made in Milan, Italy.

kartell.Name: Componibili 3-Tier Storage Unit
kartell.Body:
The Componibili 3-Tier Storage Unit is a timeless furnishing classic that continues to be the perfect addition to any contemporary home.

This sleek and stylish storage unit combines form and function to create a compact piece of furniture that will elevate the look of any space - whether it be a bedroom, living room, or even a bathroom. The three compartments with smooth sliding doors provide easy, clean access to your hidden belongings.

Designed By: Anna Castelli Ferrieri in 1967

Materials: Batch-dyed ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general) and do not stand on the product or use the product as a ladder.

Made in Milan, Italy.

kartell-componibili.Name: Componibili Bio 3-Tier Storage Unit
kartell-componibili.Body:
Componibili Bio originates from a 50 year-old series of symbolic storage units which have been produced in a new version with a revolutionary sustainable material. Ongoing research and innovation in industrial processes have enabled the Componibili Bio to be produced with a biopolymer made from renewable raw materials, derived from non-GMO agricultural waste not intended for the food chain.

The product has obtained international TÜV Austria certification with the maximum star rating and, as a designer product, will only gain value over time.

Available with a fixed, non-stackable, three element structure in a soft touch effect matte finish.

Designed by Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Biomaterial from a renewable source

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell-componibili.Name: Componibili Smile 2-Tier Storage Unit
kartell-componibili.Body:
Fabio Novembre re-interprets the icon created by Anna Castelli Ferrieri: Componibili’s classic round hole has been reinterpreted into a winking eye, a nod to the emojis of today. The timeless classic acquires a playful new interpretation that fits perfectly into children’s spaces.

This is a cylindrical Componibili with a fixed, 2-level structure.

Designed by Fabio Novembre as a tribute to Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Batch-Dyed or Painted ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Care: Clean the product with a damp cloth and soap or neutral liquid detergents diluted with water. Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

kartell-componibili.Name: Componibili Smile 2-Tier Storage Unit
kartell-componibili.Body:
Fabio Novembre re-interprets the icon created by Anna Castelli Ferrieri: Componibili’s classic round hole has been reinterpreted into a winking eye, a nod to the emojis of today. The timeless classic acquires a playful new interpretation that fits perfectly into children’s spaces.

This is a cylindrical Componibili with a fixed, 2-level structure.

Designed by Fabio Novembre as a tribute to Anna Castelli Ferrieri

Materials: Batch-Dyed or Painted ABS

Fireproof: Not Fireproof

Usage: Indoor

Do not use ethyl alcohol or detergents that contain even small amounts of acetone, trichloroethylene or ammonia (or solvents in general). Do not stand on the product, or use the product as a ladder. 

Made in Milan, Italy

roros-tweed.Name: Kvam Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
The Kvam series is characterized by its playful geometry, which is based on the possibilities and limitations of jacquard weave. The motif clearly relates to the weave's horizontal and vertical directions, while the diagonal lines create rhythm and dynamics. The pattern can be associated with both Norwegian and Japanese motifs.

Designed By: Kristine Five Melvær

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade in Norway

Designed By: Anderssen & Voll

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

roros-tweed.Name: Toskaft Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
The blanket Toskaft was designed based on the theme past-present, and inspiration was found in a photograph of curtains designed by Annelise Knudtzon for Røros Tweed in the 1970s. Polmar was inspired by the simple and straightforward fabric, and attracted to it's everyday expression.

Polmar's design is based on classical weaving techniques, translated into a contemporary and clean expression. The stitches work as building blocks, or pixels, in a graphic composition. The different color versions provide the same pattern with very different looks, from discreet neutrals to more colorful and playful.

Designed By: Sara Wright Polmar

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

roros-tweed.Name: City Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
Ingunn Birkeland is an Oslo-based fashion designer known for her unique handmade woven square patterns in combination with her very own specific palette of pastels and fluorescing colours.

The City series is Birkeland´s colorful and vibrant interpretation of one of her signature patterns, executed in a brushed jacquard quality.

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

roros-tweed.Name: Mikkel Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
The Mikkel series was launched at the ICFF in New York back in 2015, and was awarded best textile at the ICFF editors awards. The motifs combines a geometric pattern inspired by the Bauhaus movement and Norwegian weaving traditions with a modern and contemporary use of colors.

Designed By: Kristine Five Melvær

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

roros-tweed.Name: Knut Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
The Knut series draws inspiration from the most⁠ elementary process in weaving, the actual⁠ binding of the vertical and horizontal⁠ threads. The pattern is a tight and precise⁠
grid, drawn in saturated colors.⁠

Designed By: Hallgeir Homstvedt

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

roros-tweed.Name: Moon Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
With the Moon throw, von Zweigbergk wanted to explore the reversibility of woven patterns. Using a gradient between two contrasting colours, the design reminds of the moon or the sun, emphasizing the throw’s duality. It can also be read as a play between a convex and concave shape.

The Moon throws comes in four colourways where each colour explores the celestial shades of the sun and moon. From the soft pastels seen in the morning to the clear bright colors seen during the night.

Designed By: Clara von Zweigbergk

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.

Handmade it Norway

roros-tweed.Name: Ida Blanket
roros-tweed.Body:
The new Ida design draws inspiration from patchwork and hand made tapestries. Initially A&V made a full scale model of the design from coloured paper, and the traces of the hand through small imperfections and irregularities were preserved and brought into the woven fabric.

Designed By: Anderssen & Voll

Materials: 100% Norwegian lambswool

Care: Hand wash at 30 C / 86 F. Iron at low temperature. Do not tumble dry.
